lines.text: By the way, what brings you to Tonto?

We're-we're looking for work. Done some entertainin' in our time and folks say not bad... I'm considered the best mandolin picker in Arizona and Tex here, he hits mighty few sour notes on the vocal chords.
That's your trouble, fella. You're meddlin' in the wrong business.
I mean, you're playing both ends from the middle and you can't do it around here. This place ain't big enough for you and me, so you better get rollin'.
And suppose I don't get rollin'?
You will... 'cause I got you figured right. You're yellow!
[Red punches Tex in the jaw, a barroom brawl ensues and Tex knocks Red out]
I startin' something and I'm going to finish it - tonight! The sun will never rise on that hombre.
